Other utils.¶

There are some helpers:

utils.coroutine(f)¶
Parameters:f – a coroutine to initialise.
Returns:coroutine.

Decorator to initialize coroutine. It make something like this:

>>> def my_coroutine():
>>>    ...
>>> next(my_coroutine)
utils.last_hero(armies)¶
Parameters:armies – a list of armies. This is property of class BattleField.
Returns:bool.

Calculate the state of army where only one solder has left. It takes a list and returns True if there’s only one solder in list of all armies. Otherwise returns False.
